title: HPE security advisory (AV25-618)
description: On September 23, 2025, HPE published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200  versions prior to v1.60.88
HPE Superdome Flex Server  versions prior to v4.10.18
HPE Superdome Flex 280 Server  versions prior to v2.05.12
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
